mapper.select: select case_id, patient_id, patient_name, nurse_id, nurse_name, doctor_id, doctor_name, case_describe, in_time, is_leave, out_time, comment from patient_case_info where case_id = #{caseId}
mapper.insert: insert into patient_case_info(case_id, patient_id, patient_name, nurse_id, nurse_name, doctor_id, doctor_name, case_describe, in_time, is_leave, out_time, comment) values (#{caseId}, #{patientId}, #{patientName}, #{nurseId}, #{nurseName}, #{doctorId}, #{doctorName}, #{caseDescribe}, #{inTime}, #{isLeave}, #{outTime}, #{comment})

insert into patient_case_info(patient_id, patient_name, nurse_id, nurse_name, doctor_id, doctor_name, case_describe, in_time, is_leave, out_time, comment) values
(#{entity.patientId}, #{entity.patientName}, #{entity.nurseId}, #{entity.nurseName}, #{entity.doctorId}, #{entity.doctorName}, #{entity.caseDescribe}, #{entity.inTime}, #{entity.isLeave}, #{entity.outTime}, #{entity.comment})

insert into patient_case_info(patient_id, patient_name, nurse_id, nurse_name, doctor_id, doctor_name, case_describe, in_time, is_leave, out_time, comment) values
(#{entity.patientId}, #{entity.patientName}, #{entity.nurseId}, #{entity.nurseName}, #{entity.doctorId}, #{entity.doctorName}, #{entity.caseDescribe}, #{entity.inTime}, #{entity.isLeave}, #{entity.outTime}, #{entity.comment})
on duplicate key update patient_id = values(patient_id), patient_name = values(patient_name), nurse_id = values(nurse_id), nurse_name = values(nurse_name), doctor_id = values(doctor_id), doctor_name = values(doctor_name), case_describe = values(case_describe), in_time = values(in_time), is_leave = values(is_leave), out_time = values(out_time), comment = values(comment)
mapper.update:
update patient_case_info
patient_id = #{patientId},
patient_name = #{patientName},
nurse_id = #{nurseId},
nurse_name = #{nurseName},
doctor_id = #{doctorId},
doctor_name = #{doctorName},
case_describe = #{caseDescribe},
in_time = #{inTime},
is_leave = #{isLeave},
out_time = #{outTime},
comment = #{comment},
where case_id = #{caseId}
